title: Project-Based Learning Course for Strengthening Pre-Service Teachers' Digital Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in using foundational digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice environment configuration using VR simulation tools in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can design and produce a PPT for one social studies unit using various digital tools
Learners can develop a 5-minute multimodal courseware and apply it to instructional design through digital resource integration
Prospective teachers can design, operate, and evaluate a 10-minute VR-based simulated lesson using microteaching techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
